name: delicious
content:

B1 having a very pleasant taste or smell: a delicious cake The delicious smell of freshly made coffee came from the kitchen. This wine is delicious.
used to describe a situation or activity that gives you great pleasure: I have some delicious gossip to tell you.
More examplesFewer examplesThis wine has a delicious fruity flavour.The food was absolutely delicious.I can recommend the chicken in mushroom sauce - it's delicious.There's a delicious smell in here.That was a delicious lunch, thank you.
